item.title: Tips on SSH
item.description: Generate SSH keys ssh-keygen -C w@h12.io Authorize public key at remote server ssh-copy-id user@host On Mac OSX, ssh-copy-id should be installed first. brew install ssh-copy-id Generate PEM ssh-keygen -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa -e -m pem > ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pem Copy file by base64 On remote session, run base64 < myfile and copy the output. On local terminal, run base64 -d > myfile, paste the content and press ctrl+D.
